visualization_prompt: Generate a spline chart showing monthly sales trends over 2010 using datetime axis with synthetic data demonstrating seasonal patterns and growth trend
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains 12 monthly observations of sales figures across 2010 (univariate time series). Synthetic data combines three statistical properties: 1) Overall 12% growth trend (μ=152.5, σ=45.2), 2) Seasonal summer peak in June, and 3) Q4 holiday season dip. Data points use Date.UTC for time encoding with implicit monthly intervals. The spline chart emphasizes trend continuity while minimizing plot markers maximizes data-ink ratio. Color choice (#4a90e2) provides 3:1 contrast against white background, complying with WCAG standards. Rotated x-axis labels prevent overlap while maintaining temporal precision. Annotated tooltips use D3-style formatting for financial clarity.
